rows.label: qst200903_msg003
rows.name:
You can say that again.
Suddenly, a rampaging Armu
crashed into my shop.

rows.label: qst200903_msg004
rows.name:
Thanks to that, the windmill
that grinds the flour
broke and stopped...

rows.label: qst200903_msg005
rows.name:
I'm at my wit's end... I
won't be able to open for
a while like this...

rows.label: qst200903_msg006
rows.name:
It's alright, sir. There's
no need to be sad!

rows.label: qst200903_msg007
rows.name:
We've just eaten the Lucky Sachiveria
Bread and are full of happiness, so
we will help repair this shop!

rows.label: qst200903_msg009
rows.name:
That's a kind offer,
but... are you sure?

rows.label: qst200903_msg010
rows.name:
Yes! We help each other
in times of trouble!

rows.label: qst200903_msg011
rows.name:
Young lady, you're a good
kid... I hope to have a
daughter like you someday!

rows.label: qst200903_msg012
rows.name:
Then, could I ask you to
call the foreman for me?

rows.label: qst200903_msg013
rows.name:
To reopen, repairing the
windmill is essential.

rows.label: qst200903_msg014
rows.name:
Otto-san, who looks after the
windmill, should be at the Saets
Lumber Company near the town entrance.

rows.label: qst200903_msg015
rows.name:
I'm sorry, but could
you call him for me?

rows.label: qst200903_msg017
rows.name: Now, everyone, let's go see Otto-san!
